document.full_text: ohio's legislature on wednesday passed a republican measure to curb the collective bargaining rights of about 350,000 state employees, and governor john kasich said he will sign it into law.
document.title: ohio legislature passes bill curbing union rights
lines_and_colors: ohio's legislature on wednesday passed a republican measure to curb the collective bargaining rights of about 350,000 state employees, and governor john kasich said he will sign it into law.
